document_data.name: Xorta
document_data.mainbody: '''Xorta''' was a young [[stone giant]] in [[Undermountain]] in the early 1490s [[DR]].
document_data.History:
''Circa'' [[1483 DR]], [[Halaster Blackcloak]] lured Xorta's family inside [[Maddgoth's Castle]] and cursed them to remember nothing of their past lives and even anything that had happened over eight hours previously.

In [[1492 DR]],{{Waterdeep-time}} Xorta dreamed of exploring more of the dungeon. She also tried to learn to play the flute, despite often forgotting her lessons.
document_data.Personality: Xorta had the soul of an explorer but couldn't abandon her family and her parents wouldn't let her stray far.
